title: processSyncCommittee slot bug
body:
<!--NOTE: -->
<!--- General questions should go to the discord chat instead of the issue tracker.-->

**Describe the bug**
Can't validate any blocks when synced to the head in Teku's altair devnet.

```
Jun-03 15:09:56.655 [CHAIN]           error: Block error slot=10039 code=BLOCK_ERROR_BEACON_CHAIN_ERROR, error={"message":"Cannot get block root for slot in the future: 10038 < 10038"}
Error: Cannot get block root for slot in the future: 10038 < 10038
    at Object.lt (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/utils/src/assert.ts:43:13)
    at getBlockRootAtSlot (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/beacon-state-transition/src/util/blockRoot.ts:16:10)
    at getSyncCommitteeSignatureSet (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/beacon-state-transition/src/altair/block/processSyncCommittee.ts:50:22)
    at getAllBlockSignatureSetsExceptProposer (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/beacon-state-transition/src/allForks/signatureSets/index.ts:48:39)
    at Object.getAllBlockSignatureSets (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/beacon-state-transition/src/allForks/signatureSets/index.ts:27:59)
    at processBlock (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/chain/blocks/process.ts:55:20)
    at processBlockJob (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/chain/blocks/processor.ts:59:5)
    at Object.job (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/chain/blocks/processor.ts:38:42)
    at Timeout._onTimeout (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/util/queue/index.ts:106:22)
Error: BLOCK_ERROR_BEACON_CHAIN_ERROR
    at processBlock (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/chain/blocks/process.ts:81:11)
    at processBlockJob (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/chain/blocks/processor.ts:59:5)
    at Object.job (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/chain/blocks/processor.ts:38:42)
    at Timeout._onTimeout (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/util/queue/index.ts:106:22)
```

**Expected behavior**

Not error
